Name: Froggerty Arcade (Triple Game Pack)
About the game: Simply help Froggy across the road while avoiding cars, buses and even tanks! Then over the river by hopping onto a plethora of floating objects like logs and lillipads but watch out for those snakes and hungry crocodiles! Get a top score by grabbing all those points/time bonuses. Oh and keep an eye on that clock cos Froggy doesn’t want to be late home! FEATURING : _ 3 Exciting game modes : ARCADE - A fresh new take on classic frog jumping RETRO - Relieve that early 1980's pixel goodness SURVIVAL - Keep on jumping - Not a hop backwards, _ Easy, addictive and fun gameplay _ Eye popping cartoon style graphics _ Multiple uniquely designed stages to beat _ Eat the insects for a score boost _ World froggy ranking leaderboard - Post a score and show off your hopping skills! _ Super chilled exclusive soundtrack _ Perfect time killer CONTROLS Right hand : Cursor Keys Left hand - W/A/S/D Pause - ‘Space’ or 'P' If you enjoy playing Froggerty Arcade then please feel free to drop us a review. We welcome all feedback. Froggerty Arcade - Hop to it!
